com.attivio.sdk.server.util

Interface SystemEventPublisher


  • public interface SystemEventPublisher
    Interface that can be injected into any PlatformComponent or bean that needs to send events/traps.
    See Also:
    SystemEventPublisherAware

      Publishes an event with severity SYS_INFO to the platform.
